name: Battle for Orion 2
description: Earth has been destroyed. Mankind is fractured. The galaxy is at war. But one hope remains: a new home for mankind. Probes detected a habitable planet in the Orion sector. You must fight your way to it, but nothing is as it seems. A more devious plan is underway that threatens the entire galaxy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Quad Core 2Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
